oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Civil Defense check presented to Nashville Mayor West by TVA, 1954
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Presentation of a check donated by Tennessee Valley Authority (TVA) to Nashville Mayor Ben West, promoting the Civil Defense program. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: West, Ben, 1911-1974
